title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 8 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 8 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Clay and Buck welcome Bill O'Reilly to the show to discuss his upcoming interview with President Trump. Will Trump run again in 2024? O'Reilly advice to Trump was: Remember what Winston Churchill accomplished. Neither Biden nor Kamala Harris will seek 2024 nomination. Crime wave across all blue cities. San Francisco sees 753% increase in car break-ins. Liberal district attorneys don't prosecute shoplifting, and then are surprised when stores close and leave the city. The messy withdrawal from Afghanistan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
